if.div:
<--img src="search_arrow.png" x="+130" y="-2" /> <--img src="search_bg.png" w="100%-25"/>
<--color fgcolor="#000000" bgcolor="#FF434B" target="normal" />
<--button x="next" src="search_button.png" srcindex="1" cmw="8" target="searchbutton" />
<--if cond="search"> <--div x="14" y="325" w="273" h="60">
<--input x="3" y="3" w="100%-28" h="37"> <--color fgcolor="#000000" bgcolor="#D0C288" target="normal" /> <--/input> <--button x="next" src="search_button.png" target="searchbutton" />
<--button x="next" y="-2" src="Button_Musikauswahl.png" cmw="8" target="searchbutton" />
<--box x="-10" y="-32" w="330" h="30" target="searchinfo" inactive="1"> <--color target="normal" fgcolor="#8E763E" /> <--/box>
